description: The only Gun app in the catalog!  “The Guns of War” offers 9 guns that you can load and shoot via the correct positioning and movements of the phone, or just tap the screen to reload/shoot. Each gun has its own realistic cocking and shooting sound effect. The cocking and shooting relies upon the accelerometer in the phone. The guns you can choose from are a Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher, 12 Gauge Shotgun, Sniper Rifle, Russian AK-47, Special Forces M-16, Mossad Uzi, P90, and a Beretta 9mm. You will love loading and shooting the Guns of War. Note: Video Help for using sniper rifle and other guns - http://bit.ly/gunsofwar2 - hopefully that helps with the learning curve of using the app.
